title: No messages returned errors bypass retry logic
description:
Node.js unhandled promise rejections from Claude CLI print to terminal but don't get captured in $RALPH_TMP, so retry logic never triggers. Need better stderr capture and debugging logs to diagnose.

Symptom: Error prints to screen, Ralph exits immediately without retry.
Expected: Ralph catches error, shows 'Retry 1/3', waits cooldown, retries.

Related: BUG-019 was marked complete but line 18 (script/unbuffer capture) was never implemented.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add debug log showing what's in $RALPH_TMP after Claude exits
Add debug log showing exit code from pipestatus
Add debug log showing has_error and is_no_messages_error values
Log first 5 and last 10 lines of $RALPH_TMP for diagnosis
Determine if error goes to stderr vs stdout
Check if tee is losing output somehow
Implement proper stderr capture (script -q, unbuffer, or separate pipe)
Ensure retry logic triggers on 'No messages returned'
Test: Manually trigger error, verify retry message appears
Test: Verify $RALPH_TMP contains error text after failure
Commit: fix: BUG-028 capture No messages returned errors for retry
